TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 灰帽薹草 ( 原变种) hui mao tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Male spike 1–1.7 cm, ca. 1 mm thick, linear. Female glume usually mucronate at apex. Fl. and fr. Apr–May.
treatment.distribution: Sandy slopes, bamboo forests. Anhui, Jiangsu, Zhejiang [Japan, Korea].
